  • Classes in grafiosch.rest used by grafiosch.rest
    Class
    Description
    DailyLimitUpdCreateLogger
    Abstract class providing logging and daily limit checks for create, update, and delete (CUD) operations on entities.
    UpdateCreate
    Abstract REST controller for creating and updating entities of type T.
    UpdateCreateDeleteAudit
    Abstract REST controller that extends UpdateCreateResource to include functionality for deleting entities with auditing and rights checking.
    UpdateCreateDeleteAuditResource
    Delete a shared entity, that means the owner of the entity or an user with the required privileges can delete it.
    UpdateCreateDeleteWithTenantJpaRepository
    The deletion of the entity will only happened when the entity belongs to a certain tenant.
